nl.esciencecenter.xenon.adaptors.ssh

Class OpenSSHConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.xenon.adaptors.ssh.OpenSSHConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jcraft.jsch.ConfigRepository

    public class OpenSSHConfig
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.jcraft.jsch.ConfigRepository
    This class implements ConfigRepository interface, and parses OpenSSH's configuration file. It does not support the Match argument from OpenSSH config. For more information on the format of the config file, see man page ssh_config(5).
